Sentencas: The crystalline structure, redox stability and electrical conductivity of LaCrO3, (La1-xMx)CrO3 (M = Mg, Ca, Ba for x = 0.3 and M = Sr for x=0.25), and (La0.75Sr0.25)(Cr0.5Mn0.5)O-3 (LSCM) perovskites are studied from 500 to 800 degrees C in both oxidizing and reducing atmospheres.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity and performance of doped LaCrO3 perovskite oxides for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Dopability, redox stability and electrical conductivity are compared and examined.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity and performance of doped LaCrO3 perovskite oxides for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A-site doping with alkaline elements is found to improve significantly the electrical conductivity, particularly if properly doped.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity and performance of doped LaCrO3 perovskite oxides for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The highest conductivity is obtained with Ca- and Sr-doped LaCrO3.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity and performance of doped LaCrO3 perovskite oxides for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A-site doping also reduces the activation energy of the electrical conductivity, particularly under a reducing environment.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity and performance of doped LaCrO3 perovskite oxides for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Preliminary electrochemical results indicate that Ca-doped LaCrO3 shows promise as a cathode for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity and performance of doped LaCrO3 perovskite oxides for solid oxide fuel cells
Electrical conductivity and performance of doped LaCrO3 perovskite oxides for solid oxide fuel cells
Electrical conductivity and performance of doped LaCrO3 perovskite oxides for solid oxide fuel cells
